decks.notes: The main goal of this deck is to control the game through counterspells, removal spells, and disruption while using Ertai Resurrected as the commander to generate incremental advantage. The deck focuses on utilizing powerful control spells like Cryptic Command, Drown in the Loch, and Mana Leak to prevent opponents from developing their board and protect Ertai. It also includes a variety of versatile cards like Narset, Parter of Veils and Mental Misstep to disrupt opponents' strategies. The deck aims to outvalue opponents by generating card advantage with spells like Fact or Fiction and Mystic Confluence, while also utilizing cards like Demonic Tutor to find key pieces to ensure victory.

The deck focuses on a powerful reanimation strategy, utilizing cards like Animate Dead, Corpse Dance, and Exhume to bring back powerful creatures from the graveyard. It also includes disruptive spells like Thoughtseize, Duress, and Inquisition of Kozilek to control the opponent's hand and disrupt their game plan. The deck features a mix of high-impact creatures like Archon of Cruelty, Griselbrand, and Sheoldred, the Apocalypse to apply pressure and win the game quickly. Additionally, the deck includes efficient removal spells like Fatal Push, Dismember, and Toxic Deluge to deal with opposing threats. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with powerful creatures and disruptive spells while maintaining control of the game.

The deck revolves around utilizing aggressive strategies to overwhelm opponents, focusing on quick and efficient plays. Fire Lord Azula serves as the commander, providing powerful abilities to support the aggressive game plan. The deck includes a mix of removal spells, card draw, counterspells, and versatile creatures to maintain board control and pressure the opponent. It also features a variety of dual lands and fetch lands to ensure consistent mana production. By combining efficient threats with disruptive spells, the deck aims to maintain a proactive stance in the game and push for a quick victory through relentless aggression and smart decision-making.

This deck focuses on maintaining board control and disrupting the opponent's game plan through a combination of low-cost creatures, removal spells, and protection spells. Phelia, Exuberant Shepherd serves as the commander, providing a proactive aggro strategy while also enabling flicker effects to gain value from enter-the-battlefield triggers. The deck includes cards like Elite Spellbinder and Thalia, Guardian of Thraben to disrupt the opponent's spells, along with removal options like Path to Exile and Skyclave Apparition to deal with threats. With a mix of resilient creatures and disruptive spells, the deck aims to quickly establish a strong board presence and outmaneuver the opponent in a 1 vs 1 Duel Commander format.

The deck focuses on aggressive gameplay with a mix of creatures and removal spells to control the board and pressure the opponent. Phelia, Exuberant Shepherd serves as the commander, providing a consistent source of aggression with her abilities. The deck includes a variety of low-cost creatures like Cathar Commando, Mother of Runes, and Thraben Inspector to establish early board presence. Removal spells like Swords to Plowshares and Oust help deal with opposing threats, while cards like Palace Jailer and Parallax Wave provide additional control options. Supporting cards like Stoneforge Mystic and Umezawa's Jitte offer additional utility and power to push for a quick victory. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with an aggressive game plan while maintaining control of the board.

This deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and powerful spells, utilizing the synergy between the partner commanders Kraum and Yoshimaru. By combining white, blue, and red cards, the deck is able to control the battlefield with removal spells like Swords to Plowshares and Lightning Bolt while also deploying threats such as Adeline, Resplendent Cathar and Embercleave to quickly close out the game. The deck also includes mana-fixing lands and cards like Arid Mesa and Hallowed Fountain to ensure smooth mana production and consistency in casting spells efficiently. Overall, the strategy revolves around fast-paced aggro gameplay backed up by versatile control elements to outpace and outmaneuver the opponent in a 1 vs 1 duel format.

This deck revolves around utilizing Atraxa, Grand Unifier as the commander to control the game. It focuses on powerful spells and creatures to disrupt opponents and control the board. The deck contains a range of cards to search for specific spells, counter opponent's plays, and reanimate powerful creatures. It also includes cards like Show and Tell and Omniscience to quickly gain advantage and win the game. The deck aims to outvalue opponents by efficiently using its resources and controlling the game tempo. With a variety of removal spells, counterspells, and powerful creatures, this deck aims to dominate the battlefield and outmaneuver opponents in a 1 vs 1 format.

The deck focuses on quickly deploying threats and overwhelming the opponent with aggressive creatures and efficient removal spells. The commander, Terra, Magical Adept, provides valuable card advantage and recursion, while cards like Aang, Swift Savior and Grist, the Hunger Tide offer powerful threats that can quickly close out the game. The deck also includes a variety of mana acceleration options like Elvish Mystic and Utopia Sprawl to ensure a fast start. Additionally, disruptive elements like Opposition Agent and Notion Thief help disrupt the opponent's plans and give the deck an edge in the resource game. Overall, the deck aims to apply pressure early and maintain momentum to secure a victory.
